name: @tw5/y-websocket
description: A y-websocket provider (server/client) for real-time multi-user syncing with TiddlyWiki5

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && rollup -c && npm run copy
scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run demo
scripts.demo: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./demo/plugins node node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js +plugins/@tw5/y-websocket +plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem ./demo/editions/multiplayer --listen host=127.0.0.1 port=8080 'admin=(authenticated)' 'readers=(anon)' 'writers=(authenticated)' credentials=./settings/credentials.csv root-tiddler=$:/core/save/yjs required-plugins=$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem,$:/plugins/@tw5/y-websocket debug-level=none
scripts.debug: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./demo/plugins node --trace-warnings node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js +plugins/@tw5/y-websocket +plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem ./demo/editions/multiplayer npm--listen host=127.0.0.1 port=8080 'admin=(authenticated)' 'readers=(anon)' 'writers=(authenticated)' credentials=./settings/credentials.csv root-tiddler=$:/core/save/yjs required-plugins=$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem,$:/plugins/@tw5/y-websocket debug-level=full

author: Joshua Fontany <joshua.fotnany@gmail.com
